data.title: Listen on NTS
data.meta_description:
NTS aired an episode dedicated to the music of DJ Muggs on 15 May 2017. DJ Muggs has been played over 40 times on NTS, first on 14 April 2017. DJ Muggs's music has been featured on 39 episodes.

Muggs (born: Lawrence Muggerud), also called DJ Muggs, started out in the short-lived rap group The 7A3 before helping found what would become one of the most respected and popular rap groups of all time: Cypress Hill. Cypress Hill have now released seven studio albums and a lot of singles, a few EP's, and even a live album. But Muggs' career is not limited only to...
data.text:
NTS aired an episode dedicated to the music of DJ Muggs on 15 May 2017. DJ Muggs has been played over 40 times on NTS, first on 14 April 2017. DJ Muggs's music has been featured on 39 episodes.

Muggs (born: Lawrence Muggerud), also called DJ Muggs, started out in the short-lived rap group The 7A3 before helping found what would become one of the most respected and popular rap groups of all time: Cypress Hill. Cypress Hill have now released seven studio albums and a lot of singles, a few EP's, and even a live album. But Muggs' career is not limited only toâ€¦
